  updateUser(
    id: 12345

    email: "johndoeupdated@example.com"

------------------Payload:-------------------

type Query {
  customers(filters: [Filter!]!, aggregations: [Aggregation!]!) : CustomerAggregateResult!
}

input Filter {
  name: String!
}

input Aggregation {
  field: String!
  operation: String! @enum(name: "Operation")
}

type CustomerAggregateResult {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  address: Address!
  ageSum: Int!
}

    name

      country
